testcase.name: Vice Dean desr programi olusturur
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "https://managementonschools.com/" sayfasina gider..........passed When kullanici anasayfa login bolumune tiklar...............................passed And kullanici vice dean hesabi login icin User Name alanina kullanici adi girer.passed And kullanici vice dean hesabi icin Password alanina password girer.........passed Then kullanici login butonuna tiklar........................................passed And kullanici menu secenegine tiklar........................................passed And kullanici Lesson Management secenegine tiklar...........................passed And kullanici Lesson Program secenegine tiklar..............................passed And kullanici Choose Lessons listesinde ders secer..........................passed And kullanici Choose Education Term bolumunden donem secer..................passed And kullanici Choose Day listesinden gun secer..............................passed And kullanici Start Time secebilmelidir.....................................passed And kullanici Stop Time secebilmelidir......................................passed And Lesson Program bolumundeki submit butonuna tiklar.......................passed And kullanici Created Lesson Program yazisini gorur.........................passed And kullanici sayfayi kapatir...............................................passed
